Record Class HexagoView

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Record
fr.uge.cascadia.view.HexagoView
Record Components:
xOrigin - The x-coordinate of the board's top-left corner.
yOrigin - The y-coordinate of the board's top-left corner.
tileSize - The size of each tile in pixels.
viewUtils - Utility class for rendering images and tokens.
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameView
public record HexagoView(int xOrigin, int yOrigin, int tileSize, ViewUtils viewUtils) extends Record implements GameView
Represents the view for hexagonal tiles and manages the drawing of the game board, shelf, and graphical elements on the screen for hexagonal based boards.
